# J2000-JNow
Compare libraries providing J2000 to JNow for astrometry

example-output.txt
```
./testlibNOVA
JNow  2457935.448548439890
J2000 ra,dec 345.986294056000 , 28.150389198100
JNow  ra,dec 346.197906601428 , 28.244943499508
./testNOVAS
JNow  2457935.449340277817
J2000 ra,dec 345.986294056000 , 28.150389198100
JNow  ra,dec 346.197906982434 , 28.244934592671
./testSOFA
J2000 ra,dec 345.986294056000 , 28.150389198100
JNow  ra,dec 345.769426722297 , 28.235388822412

./comparelibNOVA-NOVAS-SOFA
libNOVA UTC JNow  2457936.068490725011
NOVAS   TT  JNow  2457936.069291465450
                                              Δ J2000         Δ NOVAS
             ra°             ,dec°            ra″    ,dec″    ra″    ,dec″
J2000        345.986294056000,28.150389198100
libNOVA JNow 346.197927136794,28.244952676490 761.879,340.429
NOVAS   JNow 346.197927519334,28.244943768562 761.880,340.396
SOFA    JNow 346.075130201609,28.288468371022 319.810,497.085 442.070,-156.689
```
